name: Contingency Anomaly Response
description: Mission assurance checklists for leading crews through cascading anomalies, degraded comms, and prolonged isolation.

cards.title: Fault Isolation Sprint
cards.description: Run a ten-minute drill to isolate primary vs. secondary fault indications using cross-sensor validation.
cards.summaryText: Fast fault isolation keeps the crew ahead of cascading alarms.

cards.title: Command Authority Tag-Up
cards.description: Confirm who holds tactical command when primary controllers drop offline.
cards.summaryText: Authority ambiguity is a bigger risk than the anomaly itself.

cards.title: Anomaly Battle Drill
cards.description: Execute the standardized anomaly checklist start-to-finish with timers to ensure muscle memory holds.
cards.summaryText: Battle drills only work when performed under a clock.

cards.title: Isolation Communications Plan
cards.description: Draft a micro-brief the crew can transmit blindly when contact with higher is intermittent.
cards.summaryText: Isolation briefs keep trust intact even with patchy comms.

cards.title: Logistics Sustainment Check
cards.description: Inventory consumables and reforecast endurance every 24 hours during long contingencies.
cards.summaryText: Contingency calm relies on a transparent sustainment picture.

cards.title: Reconstitution Handoff
cards.description: Write the reconstitution handoff package while the anomaly is still ongoing so relief crews can take over instantly.
cards.summaryText: Great commanders write the next crew's playbook before they arrive.
